content:
StandardEventTask Enum

Definition

Defines the standard tasks that are attached to events by the event provider. For more information about tasks, see EventTask.

In this Article

public enum StandardEventTask
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
StandardEventTask

Fields

None

No task is used to identify a portion of an application that publishes an event.
